Package SalesControllers

Class MakeSaleRequestPageController

java.lang.Object
SalesControllers.MakeSaleRequestPageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MakeSaleRequestPageController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This Class is a Make Sale Request Page Controller for MakeSaleRequestPage.fxml ,it runs all the methods that functions the choices of making a sale : Choose Template Choose Percentage Choose Area Write the product's id that the manager wants to apply sale on Note: this class uses help from CommonMethods class
Author:
Shadi
